overview: Searching for enlightenment in the digital era? Then travel to a virtual world where the most pressing questions of existence are explored by some of today's greatest minds. What is consciousness? Does God exist? What happens when we die? Set to a cool ambient soundtrack, this documentary gets to the bottom of these and other questions with the insights of psychedelic pioneer Terence McKenna, chaos theorist Ralph Abraham and many others.
title: Cognition Factor
